titleStmt.title: A supplycacion to our moste soueraigne lorde Kynge henry the eyght Kynge of England of Fraunce and of Irelande, [and] moste ernest defender of Christes gospell, supreme heade vnder God here in erthe, next [and] immedyatly of his churches of Englande and Irelande.
titleStmt.author: Tracy, Richard, d. 1569.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from STC; publication date from colophon.
Complains of the luxury and inefficiency of the Bishops and clergy.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
